cbinstall.name: PMS uddeIM Inbox
cbinstall.author: Stephan Slabihoud
cbinstall.description: v1.4 - Provides a CB Tab that shows the content of the uddeIM Inbox.

param.name: entriesNumber
param.label: Number of articles to display
param.description: If showing all posts, this is the number of posts per page. If showing only last ones, this is the number of articles to show. Default is 10

param.name: pagingEnabled
param.label: Show all blogs with paging
param.description: If set to -show all- all articles will become visible in the user profile. Otherwise, only the last submitted will be visible.
